definitions: the action or process of directing someone to the wrong place or in the wrong direction

examples.text: the deliberate misdirection that had put me off the track
misdirections given by the coastguard to rescue services

shortDefinitions: action or process of directing someone to the wrong place or in wrong direction

definitions: the wrong or inappropriate use or application of something
shortDefinitions: wrong or inappropriate use or application of something

definitions: a wrong instruction given by a judge to a jury

examples.text: he won his appeal on the basis of a misdirection by the trial judge

shortDefinitions: wrong instruction given by judge to jury
